mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERSHIP(MID, MPASSWORD,MPASSWORDCHECK, MNAME, MNUMBER, MEMAIL, MDOMAIN, MADDRESSNUMBER, MROADADDRESS, MLANDADDRESS, MDATAILEDADDRESS, MNOTE) VALUES (#{mid},#{mpassword},#{mpasswordcheck},#{mname},#{mnumber},#{memail},#{mdomain},#{maddressnumber},#{mroadaddress},#{mlandaddress},#{mdatailedaddress},#{mnote})
mapper.select: SELECT MID FROM MEMBERSHIP WHERE MID = #{mid}
SELECT MID FROM MEMBERSHIP WHERE MID =#{mid} AND MPASSWORD=#{mpassword}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERSHIP SET MPASSWORD=#{mpassword}, MNAME=#{mname}, MNUMBER=#{mnumber}, MEMAIL=#{memail}, MDOMAIN=#{mdomain}, MADDRESSNUMBER=#{maddressnumber}, MROADADDRESS=#{mroadaddress}, MLANDADDRESS=#{mlandaddress}, MDATAILEDADDRESS=#{mdatailedaddress}, MNOTE=#{mnote}
